author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Wam Capital Says ‍HY ‍Net Profit From Ordinary Activities After Income Tax Expense $87.4 Mln
text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Wam Capital Ltd:
* ‍HY REVENUE FROM ORDINARY ACTIVITIES $131.6 MILLION, UP 46.6 PERCENT
* ‍DECLARED 2018 INTERIM DIVIDEND OF 7.75 CENTS PER SHARE * HY ‍NET PROFIT FROM ORDINARY ACTIVITIES AFTER INCOME TAX EXPENSE $87.4 MILLION, UP 48.0%​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
